content.text:
# Kerala Sahitya Akademi Award for Children's Literature

The '''Kerala Sahitya Akademi Award for Children's Literature (also known as Sree Padmanabhaswamy Award for Childrenâ€™s Literature''') is an award given every year by the Kerala Sahitya Akademi (Kerala Literary Academy) to Malayalam writers for writing children's literature of literary merit. It is one of the twelve categories of the Kerala Sahitya Akademi Award.
